title: Layoff tsunami hits US as 71,000 jobs slashed in November: 2025 becomes first 1.1 million+ cut year since Pandemic
description: US layoffs surged again in November, with employers announcing 71,321 job cuts, according to new data from Challenger, Gray & Christmas. The monthly total fell sharply from October’s 153,074 reductions but remained 24% higher than the same month last year. Th…
content: US layoffs 2025 hit 1.17 million as November adds 71,321 cuts. Companies across the country are trimming staff at levels not seen since the pandemic. November alone saw 71,321 announced job cuts, pus… [+11729 chars]

raw_data.author: Piyush Shukla
